Title: Rick Bonnell: Hornets and DeMarcus Cousins? There’s a case for it.
Description: The Houston Rockets are reportedly releasing center DeMarcus Cousins. Should the Charlotte Hornets be interested? Undoubtedly, the Hornets could use another center with experience and size. The Hornets play lots of small-ball this season and resort to zone defense frequently,
Author: The Charlotte Observer on MSN.com
